title: Short-Intensive Teacher Professional Development Course Based on Computational Thinking (CT)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary computer literacy and teaching experience
context.additional_context: In-house corporate training programs for practicing professionals (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Participants can accurately explain computational thinking (CT) concepts at over 80% accuracy using the curriculum-based professional learning (CBPL) approach.
Participants improve self-efficacy for designing plugged/unplugged CT activities by at least 70%.
Participants create action plans to apply school culture (sharing/teamwork) and technology resource strategies to CT education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
